text: Karla Avelar (born 1978), she is a Salvadoran activist for the rights of transgender people. She is also the executive director of Comcavis Trans. ==Works== She also the founded an organisation of transgender people called COMCAVIS TRANS, in 2008. It was made as a support group of TRANS women. ==Awards== In 2017, she was a listed as one of the finalist of the Martin Ennals Award for Human Rights Defenders. ==References== Category:1978 births Category:LGBT rights activists Category:Living people Category:Salvadoran people
title: Karla Avelar
